articles.content: In its just-concluded event, Unleashed, the biggest draws from Apple were the 14-inch and 16-inch MacBooks, armed with custom M1 Pro and M1 Max chips. The company also introduced a $19 Polishing Clot… [+1238 chars]

articles.title: Nokia C30 launched in India at Rs 10,999: 6,000mAh battery, 6.82-inch display, 3-day battery life, and more - 91mobiles
articles.description: HMD Global has launched the new Nokia C30 in India for Rs 10,999 and gets a Unisoc SoC, 3-day battery life, and more. Read on to find out.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G51 likely to launch in few weeks, specifications tipped - 91mobiles
articles.description: Motorola Moto G51 5G could launch in November with a 50MP primary camera and Full HD+ display resolution, according to a report by Technik News.
articles.content: According to the same report, the upcoming device will have an FHD+ resolution, with its screen type or any presence of a faster refresh rate, still unknown. It further states that the upcoming Moto … [+1025 chars]
